name: Low Battery (CarsonCoates)
description:
Low Battery is a first-person action runner and survival game where vision is limited and so is everything else.  As a robot power is important to you, unfortunately, it is in scarce supply after you crash land on an alien planet.  

Including two game modes

Endless: 

- Compete for a high score, try and get through as many floors as you can!

- One life, no saving.

- No health regeneration.

Time of content: As many as you like.

Story:

- Includes gameplay tutorial.

- Has some story elements.

- Saves every floor.

Time of content: 15 min for a experienced player,  30min-1h for a new player.

Use your drone to push enemies back and see in the dark, but be careful, like everything else, her uses energy!

Energy is your health, sprint fuel, and drone power, generate as much as you can to survive.

This is my final student project,  all feedback is incredibly appreciated! Please feel free to comment below suggestions and feedback! Did you like it? hate it? Why/why not.
